nodes.text: Ladybird Books is a British publisher of children books based in London. Ladybird used to be an independent book publishing company before it became part of the Pearson Group in 1972. In 1998 it was merged into Penguin Books. Today Ladybird Books is an imprint of the Penguin Group that publishes children books, including various books based on the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
